content.title: Discrete Mathematics
content.statement: Discrete Mathematics is a fundamental concept in science mathematics that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics.

explanation.intuition: Understanding Discrete Mathematics helps build foundational knowledge in this domain.
explanation.key_insight: The key aspects of Discrete Mathematics include the core principles and their practical applications.
explanation.technical_details: Technical implementation involves applying the core principles of Discrete Mathematics to real-world scenarios.

definitions_glossary.concept: A fundamental idea or notion in the domain
definitions_glossary.property: A characteristic or attribute of an entity
definitions_glossary.relationship: A connection or association between concepts
